findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: Smart contract allows token minting to increase the total token supply without any limitation.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in transfer and transferFrom functions
findings.description: The transfer and transferFrom functions contain unprotected function calls which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected function call in approve function
findings.description: The approve function contains an unprotected function call which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in increaseAllowance and decreaseAllowance functions
findings.description: The increaseAllowance and decreaseAllowance functions contain unprotected function calls, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected internal function calls
findings.description: The _transfer, _mint, _burn, _approve, and _setupDecimals functions have unprotected internal function calls.

findings.title: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in _beforeTokenTransfer function
findings.description: The _beforeTokenTransfer function has a potential reentrancy vulnerability.

findings.title: Unprotected minting functionality in BEP20Mintable contract
findings.description: The BEP20Mintable contract has an unprotected minting functionality, allowing unauthorized access control from the derived contract to mint tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected burning functionality in BEP20Burnable contract
findings.description: The burn and burnFrom functions in the BEP20Burnable contract are unprotected, allowing unauthorized access.
